verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> to me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast:<s%> it is mine.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3318>came<s%> out from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%> for by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from <S%H2088>this<s%> place: there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> bread be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
This <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> you out in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib.<s%>

And it shall be <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you, a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> that you shall <S%H5647>keep<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread, and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H4682>Unleavened<s%> bread shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> bread be <S%H7200>seen<s%> with you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there be <S%H7603>leaven<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> with you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>quarters.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5046>show<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> This is done <S%H5668>because<s%> of that which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to me when I <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it shall be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> to you on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> may be in your <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> for with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> in his <S%H4150>season<s%> from <S%H3117>year<s%> to <S%H3117>year.<s%>

And it shall be <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> as he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it you,

That you shall set <S%H5674>apart<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>firstling<s%> that <S%H7698>comes<s%> of a <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1961>have;<s%> the <S%H2145>males<s%> shall be the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>firstling<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H6299>redeem<s%> it, then you shall <S%H6202>break<s%> his <S%H6203>neck:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> among your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall you <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>

And it shall be <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> you in <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this?<s%> that you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to him, By <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage:<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> would <S%H7185>hardly<s%> let us <S%H7971>go,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>beast:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix,<s%> being <S%H2145>males;<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of my <S%H1121>children<s%> I <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>

And it shall be for a <S%H226>token<s%> on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and for <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> for by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5148>led<s%> them not through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H3588>although<s%> that was <S%H7138>near;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> peradventure the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>repent<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4421>war,<s%> and they <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5437>led<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5437>about,<s%> through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H2571>harnessed<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> with him: for he had straightly <S%H7650>sworn<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will surely <S%H6485>visit<s%> you; and you shall <S%H5927>carry<s%> up my <S%H6106>bones<s%> away <S%H2088>hence<s%> with you.
And they took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H864>Etham,<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them by <S%H3119>day<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them the <S%H1870>way;<s%> and by <S%H3915>night<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> to give them <S%H216>light;<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night:<s%>

He <S%H4185>took<s%> not away the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> nor the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
